name: Glow Worm (itch) (Bknott3747)
description:
The goal is to gather 3 parts for the spaceship to leave the post-apocalyptic earth.

Use WASD, mouse for general traversing the world

First Puzzle:

W and S arrows to change the ring

A and D arrows to rotate the selected ring

P will finish the puzzle if you wish to progress

Goal - light all outside lights to green by projecting lasers onto them

Second Puzzle:

F to rotate the Breakers 90 degrees

Goal - Make sure the moving balls of light impact the tip of the breakers and not the long side of the breaker

Music is not made by me but is properly credited in the main menu.
